title: Paths to adopt DID in small cities
description: Large countries may be slow to adopt DID, but municipal governments can start the charge. What are the best routes for them to take?
solution: Build a model roadmap for the voluntary adoption of DID in small cities. Using Flagstaff as a test, we will grow community partnerships.
experience: Active city council member of Flagstaff as partner, grassroots organizer, JD, PhD, Blockchain full stack developer
